mapper.select: SELECT BNO,TITLE,CONTENT,BDATE,BF_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY BNO;
SELECT BNO,TITLE,CONTENT,BDATE,BF_NAME FROM BOARD WHERE UID = #{uid} ORDER BY BNO;
UPDATE BOARD SET HITS = (IFNULL(HITS,0)+1) WHERE BNO = #{bno};

SELECT BNO ,TITLE ,BDATE ,BF_NAME ,UNAME FROM BOARD A ,MEMBERS B WHERE A.UID = B.UID AND A.BNO = #{bno} UNION ALL SELECT A.RNO ,A.CONTENT ,RDATE ,RF_NAME ,B.UNAME FROM REPLY A ,MEMBERS B WHERE A.UID = B.UID AND A.BNO = #{bno};

SELECT A.BNO ,A.UID ,A.TITLE ,A.CONTENT ,A.BDATE ,A.BF_NAME ,A.GENRENO ,A.INSTNO ,A.HITS ,B.CNT ,C.UNAME FROM (SELECT A.* FROM BOARD A WHERE UID=#{uid}) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT BNO,COUNT(*) CNT FROM REPLY GROUP BY BNO) B ON A.BNO = B.BNO LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERS C ON A.UID = C.UID;
SELECT BNO, A.UID, TITLE, CONTENT, BDATE, BF_NAME, B.UNAME, B.UPHOTO FROM BOARD A JOIN MEMBERS B ON A.UID = B.UID WHERE A.BNO = #{bno};
